citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
A 1-year-old female Yorkshire terrier (m/c# 992000001390028) was squinting its left eye. There was a thick yellow
discharge in the eye and the hair around the eye was wet. The cornea of the eye was blue and opaque and had a white
area in the center. The right eye had a clear discharge and the cornea was a light blue. The licensee had not noticed
these problems and so the dog had not received veterinary care. Eye problems can be painful, can progress quickly, can
result in vision loss, and can be contagious to other dogs. The licensee must have this dog examined and diagnosed by a
veterinarian, must follow treatment recommendations, and must keep a written medical record for review by the inspector.
TO BE CORRECTED BY July 27, 2023. NOTE: The licensee made an appointment with a veterinarian during the
inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2)  Direct
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
A 1-year-old female Yorkshire terrier (m/c# 992000001390028) was squinting its left eye. There was a thick yellow 
discharge in the eye and the hair around the eye was wet. The cornea of the eye was blue and opaque and had a white 
area in the center. The right eye had a clear discharge and the cornea was a light blue. The licensee had not noticed 
these problems and so the dog had not received veterinary care. Eye problems can be painful, can progress quickly, can 
result in vision loss, and can be contagious to other dogs. The licensee must have this dog examined and diagnosed by a 
veterinarian, must follow treatment recommendations, and must keep a written medical record for review by the inspector. 
TO BE CORRECTED BY July 27, 2023. NOTE: The licensee made an appointment with a veterinarian during the 
inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
